price: Huwag kayong lumapit sa pangangalunya; tunay na ito ay laging mahalay at sumagwa bilang landas.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
